thread.title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Exchange Filing Shows Block Trade Of Tongfu Microelectronics' Shares Involving 213.9 Mln Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Exchange Filing Shows Block Trade Of Tongfu Microelectronics' Shares Involving 213.9 Mln Yuan

organizations.name: brief-shenzhen exchange filing shows block trade of tongfu microelectronics

text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Tongfu Microelectronics Co Ltd
* SHENZHEN STOCK EXCHANGE FILING SHOWS BLOCK TRADE OF TONGFU MICROELECTRONICS' 23.1 MLN SHARES INVOLVING 213.9 MILLION YUAN ($33.91 million) ON FEB 27 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2grA0v1 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3070 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
